content:
IActorStateManager IActorStateManager Interface

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Actors.Runtime
Assembly:
Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Actors.dll

Represents the interface that state manager for Actor implements.

Edit

In this Article

public interface IActorStateManagerPublic Interface IActorStateManager

Methods

AddOrUpdateStateAsync<T>(String, T, Func<String, T, T>, CancellationToken) AddOrUpdateStateAsync(Of T)(String, T, Func(Of String, T, T), CancellationToken)

Edit

Adds an actor state with given state name, if it does not already exist or updates the state with specified state name, if it exists. 

Task<T> AddOrUpdateStateAsync<T>(string stateName, T addValue, Func<string, T, T> updateValueFactory, CancellationToken cancellationToken = null)Function AddOrUpdateStateAsync(Of T)(stateName As String, addValue As T, updateValueFactory As Func(Of String, T, T), cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As Task(Of T)
Parameters
stateName
String String

Name of the actor state to add or update.

addValue
T T

Value of the actor state to add if it does not exist.

updateValueFactory
Func<String, T, T> Func(Of String, T, T)

Factory function to generate value of actor state to update if it exists.

cancellationToken
CancellationToken CancellationToken

The token to monitor for cancellation requests.

Returns
Task<T> Task(Of T)

A task that represents the asynchronous add/update operation. The value of TResult parameter contains value of actor state that was added/updated.

Exceptions
ArgumentNullException ArgumentNullException

The specified state name is null.

OperationCanceledException OperationCanceledException

The operation was canceled.

Remarks

The type of state value T must be Data Contract serializable.

AddStateAsync<T>(String, T, CancellationToken) AddStateAsync(Of T)(String, T, CancellationToken)

Edit

Adds an actor state with given state name.

Task AddStateAsync<T>(string stateName, T value, CancellationToken cancellationToken = null)Function AddStateAsync(Of T)(stateName As String, value As T, cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As Task
Parameters
stateName
String String

Name of the actor state to add.

value
T T

Value of the actor state to add.

cancellationToken
CancellationToken CancellationToken

The token to monitor for cancellation requests.

Returns
Task Task

A task that represents the asynchronous add operation.

Exceptions
InvalidOperationException InvalidOperationException

An actor state with given state name already exists.

ArgumentNullException ArgumentNullException

The specified state name is null.

OperationCanceledException OperationCanceledException

The operation was canceled.

Remarks

The type of state value T must be Data Contract serializable.

ClearCacheAsync(CancellationToken) ClearCacheAsync(CancellationToken)

Edit

Clears all the cached actor states and any operation(s) performed on IActorStateManager since last state save operation.

Task ClearCacheAsync(CancellationToken cancellationToken = null)Function ClearCacheAsync(cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As Task
Parameters
cancellationToken
CancellationToken CancellationToken

The token to monitor for cancellation requests.

Returns
Task Task

A task that represents the asynchronous clear cache operation.

Remarks

All the operation(s) performed on IActorStateManager since last save operation are cleared on clearing the cache and will not be included in next save operation.

ContainsStateAsync(String, CancellationToken) ContainsStateAsync(String, CancellationToken)

Edit

Checks if an actor state with specified name exists.

Task<bool> ContainsStateAsync(string stateName, CancellationToken cancellationToken = null)Function ContainsStateAsync(stateName As String, cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As Task(Of Boolean)
Parameters
stateName
String String

Name of the actor state.

cancellationToken
CancellationToken CancellationToken

The token to monitor for cancellation requests.

Returns
Task<Boolean> Task(Of Boolean)

A task that represents the asynchronous check operation. The value of TResult parameter is true if state with specified name exists otherwise false.

Exceptions
ArgumentNullException ArgumentNullException

The specified state name is null.

OperationCanceledException OperationCanceledException

The operation was canceled.

GetOrAddStateAsync<T>(String, T, CancellationToken) GetOrAddStateAsync(Of T)(String, T, CancellationToken)

Edit

Gets an actor state with given state name, if it exists or adds the state with specified state name and value, if it does not exist. 

Task<T> GetOrAddStateAsync<T>(string stateName, T value, CancellationToken cancellationToken = null)Function GetOrAddStateAsync(Of T)(stateName As String, value As T, cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As Task(Of T)
Parameters
stateName
String String

Name of the actor state to get or add.

value
T T

Value of the actor state to add if it does not exist.

cancellationToken
CancellationToken CancellationToken

The token to monitor for cancellation requests.

Returns
Task<T> Task(Of T)

A task that represents the asynchronous get or add operation. The value of TResult parameter contains value of actor state with given state name.

Exceptions
ArgumentNullException ArgumentNullException

The specified state name is null.

OperationCanceledException OperationCanceledException

The operation was canceled.

Remarks

The type of state value T must be Data Contract serializable.

GetStateAsync<T>(String, CancellationToken) GetStateAsync(Of T)(String, CancellationToken)

Edit

Gets an actor state with specified state name.

Task<T> GetStateAsync<T>(string stateName, CancellationToken cancellationToken = null)Function GetStateAsync(Of T)(stateName As String, cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As Task(Of T)
Parameters
stateName
String String

Name of the actor state to get.

cancellationToken
CancellationToken CancellationToken

The token to monitor for cancellation requests.

Returns
Task<T> Task(Of T)

A task that represents the asynchronous get operation. The value of TResult parameter contains value of actor state with given state name.

Exceptions
KeyNotFoundException KeyNotFoundException

An actor state with given state name does not exist.

ArgumentNullException ArgumentNullException

The specified state name is null.

OperationCanceledException OperationCanceledException

The operation was canceled.

Remarks

The type of state value T must be Data Contract serializable.

GetStateNamesAsync(CancellationToken) GetStateNamesAsync(CancellationToken)

Edit

Creates an enumerable of all actor state names for current actor.

Task<IEnumerable<string>> GetStateNamesAsync(CancellationToken cancellationToken = null)Function GetStateNamesAsync(cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As Task(Of IEnumerable(Of String))
Parameters
cancellationToken
CancellationToken CancellationToken

The token to monitor for cancellation requests.

Returns
Task<IEnumerable<String>> Task(Of IEnumerable(Of String))

A task that represents the asynchronous enumeration operation. The value of TResult parameter is an enumerable of all actor state names.

Exceptions
OperationCanceledException OperationCanceledException

The operation was canceled.

RemoveStateAsync(String, CancellationToken) RemoveStateAsync(String, CancellationToken)

Edit

Removes an actor state with specified state name.

Task RemoveStateAsync(string stateName, CancellationToken cancellationToken = null)Function RemoveStateAsync(stateName As String, cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As Task
Parameters
stateName
String String

Name of the actor state to remove.

cancellationToken
CancellationToken CancellationToken

The token to monitor for cancellation requests.

Returns
Task Task

A task that represents the asynchronous remove operation.

Exceptions
KeyNotFoundException KeyNotFoundException

An actor state with given state name does not exist.

ArgumentNullException ArgumentNullException

The specified state name is null.

OperationCanceledException OperationCanceledException

The operation was canceled.

SaveStateAsync(CancellationToken) SaveStateAsync(CancellationToken)

Edit

Saves all the cached state changes (add/update/remove) that were made since last call to SaveStateAsync(CancellationToken) by actor runtime or by user explicitly.

Task SaveStateAsync(CancellationToken cancellationToken = null)Function SaveStateAsync(cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As Task
Parameters
cancellationToken
CancellationToken CancellationToken

The token to monitor for cancellation requests.

Returns
Task Task

A task that represents the asynchronous save operation.

SetStateAsync<T>(String, T, CancellationToken) SetStateAsync(Of T)(String, T, CancellationToken)

Edit

Sets an actor state with given state name to specified value. If an actor state with specified name does not exist, it is added.

Task SetStateAsync<T>(string stateName, T value, CancellationToken cancellationToken = null)Function SetStateAsync(Of T)(stateName As String, value As T, cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As Task
Parameters
stateName
String String

Name of the actor state to set.

value
T T

Value of the actor state.

cancellationToken
CancellationToken CancellationToken

The token to monitor for cancellation requests.

Returns
Task Task

A task that represents the asynchronous set operation.

Exceptions
ArgumentNullException ArgumentNullException

The specified state name is null.

OperationCanceledException OperationCanceledException

The operation was canceled.

Remarks

The type of state value T must be Data Contract serializable.

TryAddStateAsync<T>(String, T, CancellationToken) TryAddStateAsync(Of T)(String, T, CancellationToken)

Edit

Attempts to add an actor state with given state name.

Task<bool> TryAddStateAsync<T>(string stateName, T value, CancellationToken cancellationToken = null)Function TryAddStateAsync(Of T)(stateName As String, value As T, cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As Task(Of Boolean)
Parameters
stateName
String String

Name of the actor state to add.

value
T T

Value of the actor state to add.

cancellationToken
CancellationToken CancellationToken

The token to monitor for cancellation requests.

Returns
Task<Boolean> Task(Of Boolean)

A task that represents the asynchronous add operation. The value of TResult parameter indicates if the state was successfully added.

Exceptions
ArgumentNullException ArgumentNullException

The specified state name is null.

OperationCanceledException OperationCanceledException

The operation was canceled.

Remarks

The type of state value T must be Data Contract serializable.

TryGetStateAsync<T>(String, CancellationToken) TryGetStateAsync(Of T)(String, CancellationToken)

Edit

Attempts to get an actor state with specified state name.

Task<ConditionalValue<T>> TryGetStateAsync<T>(string stateName, CancellationToken cancellationToken = null)Function TryGetStateAsync(Of T)(stateName As String, cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As Task(Of ConditionalValue(Of T))
Parameters
stateName
String String

Name of the actor state to get.

cancellationToken
CancellationToken CancellationToken

The token to monitor for cancellation requests.

Returns
Task<ConditionalValue<T>> Task(Of ConditionalValue(Of T))

A task that represents the asynchronous get operation. The value of TResult parameter contains ConditionalValue<TValue> indicating whether the actor state is present and the value of actor state if it is present.

Exceptions
ArgumentNullException ArgumentNullException

The specified state name is null.

OperationCanceledException OperationCanceledException

The operation was canceled.

Remarks

The type of state value T must be Data Contract serializable.

TryRemoveStateAsync(String, CancellationToken) TryRemoveStateAsync(String, CancellationToken)

Edit

Attempts to remove an actor state with specified state name.

Task<bool> TryRemoveStateAsync(string stateName, CancellationToken cancellationToken = null)Function TryRemoveStateAsync(stateName As String, cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As Task(Of Boolean)
Parameters
stateName
String String

Name of the actor state to remove.

cancellationToken
CancellationToken CancellationToken

The token to monitor for cancellation requests.

Returns
Task<Boolean> Task(Of Boolean)

A task that represents the asynchronous remove operation. The value of TResult parameter indicates if the state was successfully removed.

Exceptions
ArgumentNullException ArgumentNullException

The specified state name is null.

OperationCanceledException OperationCanceledException

The operation was canceled.
